3D08DF31.0_instruction: Icons on the map indicate active whispers and are only available for a limited amount of time.

8C67E8B2.1_instruction: Each whisper provides awards a number of Grim Favors upon completion.

DBC6F233.2_instruction: You can track how many Grim Favors you have from the Map. When the bar is full, return to the Tree of Whispers to claim a valuable cache of your choice.
